home.organize_collection: Organize your collection and choose the
home.next_to_hunt: next ones to hunt in one place!
home.add_favorites: How about adding those you want to find the most?
home.catch_and_see: Catch your shinies and see them here!

shinys.review_captured: Review here the Pokémon you have already caught and track your journey as a Pokémon Master.
shinys.no_captures_warning: You haven't registered any catches yet. How about starting your hunt for legendary shinies?

pokedex.title: Pokédex
pokedex.description: Explore your Pokédex to mark the Pokémon you've already caught or the shinies you want to hunt.

wishlist.title: Wishlist
wishlist.description: Create your wishlist with the shinies you dream of finding and get ready for the next big catch.
wishlist.empty_warning: No Pokémon has been marked... yet! Explore the Pokédex and build your list of desired shinies.
